fields.name: Preventative Maintenance
fields.description: Regular maintenance tasks to ensure proper equipment operation and longevity.

fields.name: Routine Cleaning
fields.description: Regular cleaning of equipment surfaces and components to maintain cleanliness and avoid contamination.

fields.name: Freezer Defrost
fields.description: Defrosting and cleaning of freezer units to ensure optimal performance and temperature control.

fields.name: Routine Calibration
fields.description: Regular calibration of equipment to ensure accurate measurements and results.

fields.name: Sample Standard Calibration
fields.description: Calibration of equipment using certified reference samples or standards.

fields.name: Disinfection
fields.description: Thorough disinfection of equipment surfaces and components to maintain sterile conditions.

fields.name: Balance Calibration
fields.description: Calibration of shakers and centrifuges to ensure equipment longevity.
